DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety treat human skin atmospheric plasma get initial evaluation efficacy treatment acne .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Plasma Treatment System Treat Back Acne
DOC.criteria: 1 . Males nonpregnant , nonnursing female age 1840 year old . 2 . Presence clinicallyevident back acne . 3 . Minimum 20 noninflammatory lesion ( open close comedo ) 4 . Minimum 30 total lesion ( sum inflammatory noninflammatory ) 5 . Subject must measurable sebum production . 6 . Subjects must generally good health . 7 . Must able willing comply requirement protocol . 1 . Any nodulocystic lesion Baseline 2 . Pregnancy breast feed 3 . Use acne device systemic therapy antibiotic within four month prior start throughout duration study 4 . Intake oral retinoids within four month prior study start throughout duration study 5 . Topical use topical retinoids within two week prior study start throughout duration study 6 . Topical use antibiotic , steroid and/or nonretinoid topical acne product within two week prior study start throughout duration study 7 . Use experimental drug device within 30 day prior study start ; 8 . Intake hormonal therapy within 3 month prior study start 9 . Use topical product back contain glycolic acid , mask , wash soap contain benzoyl peroxide salicylic acid , non mild cleanser moisturizers contain retinol , salicylic α βhydroxy acid . 10 . Concomitant use megadoses certain vitamin , vitamin D ( > 2000IU QD ) vitamin B12 , haloperidol , halogens iodide bromide , lithium , hydantoin phenobarbital . 11 . Procedures skin back chemical laser peel , microdermabrasion , photodynamic therapy ) within past 2 week study . 12 . History evidence skin condition disease may require concurrent therapy may interfere evaluation study medication 13 . Any significant medical condition could confound interpretation study result . 14 . History of/or current skin cancer cancer 15 . Use tanning booth , sun lamp within past 2 week study 16 . Any metallic implant prostheses vicinity treatment site ( shoulder , back , spine , pacemaker , etc. ) . 17 . Any known photosensitivity disorder felt investigator preclude safe inclusion study . 18 . History significant postinflammatory hyperpigmentation sit acne lesion . 19 . History currently immunocompromised .
